title: using_classification_for_predictions
description: IntroductionI believe the main issue we have in this challenge is not to predict revenues but more to get these zeros right since less than 1.3 % of the sessions have a non-zero revenue. The idea in this kernel is to classify non-zero transactions first and use that to help our regressor get better results. The kernel only presents one way of doing it. No special feature engineering or set of hyperparameters, just a code shell/structure ;-)
